text: mariyu memu viriki snehituluga (saitanulanu) niyamincamu. Varu viri mundu venuka unna vatini viriki akarsaniyamaina vatiga cesaru. Kavuna viriki purvam gatincina jinnatula mariyu manavula tarala visayanlo jarigina siksa nirnayame, viri visayanlo kuda jarigindi. Niscayanga, vire nastaniki guri ayina varayyaru
